contributions: Engineered and optimized sophisticated prompts for 15+ critical financial documents, utilizing Python, Vertex AI, and GCP to build production-level pipelines.

Initiated and led the full ML development, building it from the ground up to score and analyze production model outputs for quality. Architected a scalable backend using FastAPI, LangChain, and Docker on GKE via Azure Pipelines, integrating Gemini and OpenAI GPT models for comprehensive validation.

Contributed to a high-priority IBM Filenet replacement project, developing full-stack features with Next.js, Java Springboot, and Google's AlloyDB. Maintained critical Content Viewer, Core, and Stage components for interacting with files within the Pyro Vault.
Spearheaded a proof-of-concept replacing traditional deep learning with an Image-based Gemini approach for structured data extraction, boosting paystub accuracy from 9% to an industry-leading 90%.
